name: Try it htmlediter
short_description:
this is a simple try it html editer 
you just have to write your html code in left hand side 
and then click submit
it will show you output in right hand side.
it's simply to implement
we need 2 file.
first one will be html and second one will be php.
In html  , xmlhttprequest object is created and data is send  through this object to php file.
In php , only one echo statement is used to echo out  the content.
this content is received by XMLHttpRequest object
we will display the output.
for live code go to :http://arock.site11.com
summary: right html code and see output in right hand side
